item.title: Good Life
item.description: Every day should be a good day. People fool themselves that they’ll be here forever. -Stephen A. Schwarzman Saturday December 10th 2022 was a good day, of course there was a run involved. For the first time ever I ran a whole ultra on a whim and ended up running my fastest 50k to date. I say on a whim because I committed to running it at 4 am that morning.
